did.abstract: Isaac Allen attended courses related to architecture at New York University (NYU) in the early to mid-twentieth century. Materials include four textbooks related to architecture and architectural drawing.
did.physloc: Materials are stored offsite and advance notice is required for use. Please request materials at least two business days prior to your research visit to coordinate access.
did.langmaterial: Materials primarily in English, with two publications in French.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Materials found in collection; provenance is unknown. The accession number related to this collection is 10.036.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Isaac Allen attended courses related to architecture at New York University (NYU) in the early to mid-twentieth century.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date; Isaac Allen Papers; MC 221; box number; folder number; New York University Archives, New York University.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Processing decisions made prior to January 2019 were not recorded. In January 2019 the materials were rehoused and stabilized in a 15" x 11" flat box.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Materials include four textbooks related to architecture and architectural drawing that were used by Isaac Allen while studying architecture at New York University (NYU) in the early to mid-twentieth century. Allen inscribed his name in a few of the books.
